<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This file describes the structures used for instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// itineraries, stages, and operand reads/writes.  This is used by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// schedulers to determine instruction stages and latencies.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef LLVM&#95;MC&#95;MCINSTRITINERARIES&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;MC&#95;MCINSTRITINERARIES&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcschedule-h">llvm/MC/MCSchedule.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &lt;algorithm&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &lt;optional&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// These values represent a non-pipelined step in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the execution of an instruction.  Cycles represents the number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// discrete time slots needed to complete the stage.  Units represent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the choice of functional units that can be used to complete the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// stage.  Eg. IntUnit1, IntUnit2. NextCycles indicates how many</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// cycles should elapse from the start of this stage to the start of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the next stage in the itinerary. A value of -1 indicates that the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// next stage should start immediately after the current one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#123; 1, x, -1 &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      indicates that the stage occupies FU x for 1 cycle and that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      the next stage starts immediately after this one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#123; 2, x|y, 1 &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      indicates that the stage occupies either FU x or FU y for 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      consecutive cycles and that the next stage starts one cycle</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      after this stage starts. That is, the stage requirements</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      overlap in time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#123; 1, x, 0 &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      indicates that the stage occupies FU x for 1 cycle and that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      the next stage starts in this same cycle. This can be used to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      indicate that the instruction requires multiple stages at the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      same time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// FU reservation can be of two different kinds:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  - FUs which instruction actually requires</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  - FUs which instruction just reserves. Reserved unit is not available for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    execution of other instruction. However, several instructions can reserve</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    the same unit several times.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Such two types of units reservation is used to model instruction domain</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// change stalls, FUs using the same resource (e.g. same register file), etc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage">InstrStage</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a0c36089f8d92b1bcb9c0a582d42aa106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a0c36089f8d92b1bcb9c0a582d42aa106">ReservationKinds</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a0c36089f8d92b1bcb9c0a582d42aa106a7774578153e4ca5a7299d1f42395ae6e"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a0c36089f8d92b1bcb9c0a582d42aa106a7774578153e4ca5a7299d1f42395ae6e">Required</a> = 0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a0c36089f8d92b1bcb9c0a582d42aa106adb675fc15885dfb7a1666cc046ac7ba5"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a0c36089f8d92b1bcb9c0a582d42aa106adb675fc15885dfb7a1666cc046ac7ba5">Reserved</a> = 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Bitmask representing a set of functional units.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a28207c85d95c7a0d901b2d8dbc37b6e3"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typedef</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a28207c85d95c7a0d901b2d8dbc37b6e3">FuncUnits</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#aa8614d31923c695646f6e53413e25aca"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#aa8614d31923c695646f6e53413e25aca">Cycles&#95;</a>;  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; Length of stage in machine cycles</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a91dae4825b72bebff6c096e43cf4323b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a28207c85d95c7a0d901b2d8dbc37b6e3">FuncUnits</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a91dae4825b72bebff6c096e43cf4323b">Units&#95;</a>;  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; Choice of functional units</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#af3857eab7c0ff1a4733397f8d0f8b18e"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#af3857eab7c0ff1a4733397f8d0f8b18e">NextCycles&#95;</a>;   </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; Number of machine cycles to next stage</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#af5320a11af396a0abeddfce816e119ac"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a0c36089f8d92b1bcb9c0a582d42aa106">ReservationKinds</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#af5320a11af396a0abeddfce816e119ac">Kind&#95;</a>; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; Kind of the FU reservation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns the number of cycles the stage is occupied.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#aebf0765776840275f39418c68660b53a"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#aebf0765776840275f39418c68660b53a">getCycles</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#aa8614d31923c695646f6e53413e25aca">Cycles&#95;</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns the choice of FUs.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// An itinerary represents the scheduling information for an instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This includes a set of stages occupied by the instruction and the pipeline</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// cycle in which operands are read and written.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instritinerary"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instritinerary">InstrItinerary</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Itinerary data supplied by a subtarget to be used by a target.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#ac56cf30888e6ece9481d748dc06eca78">InstrItineraryData</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a869c0916b27a3b9990abe48e2ff9b3c6"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcschedmodel">MCSchedModel</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a869c0916b27a3b9990abe48e2ff9b3c6">SchedModel</a> =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns true if the index is for the end marker itinerary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a5444e9509ebf2f90a116001248300120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a5444e9509ebf2f90a116001248300120">isEndMarker</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ItinClassIndx)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#af1bc954cd72ba2c13fd0d00fd47343a9">Itineraries</a>&#91;ItinClassIndx&#93;.FirstStage == UINT16&#95;MAX) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">            (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#af1bc954cd72ba2c13fd0d00fd47343a9">Itineraries</a>&#91;ItinClassIndx&#93;.LastStage == UINT16&#95;MAX));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return the first stage of the itinerary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a7327da535eb156175c5a9ec7b7fea629"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage">InstrStage</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a7327da535eb156175c5a9ec7b7fea629">beginStage</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ItinClassIndx)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StageIdx = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#af1bc954cd72ba2c13fd0d00fd47343a9">Itineraries</a>&#91;ItinClassIndx&#93;.FirstStage;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a2a932c41180f005df409d7a78ab84d45">Stages</a> + StageIdx;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return the last+1 stage of the itinerary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#adb4cf1d46c5e7c0f1f877c2cd4f834a8"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage">InstrStage</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#adb4cf1d46c5e7c0f1f877c2cd4f834a8">endStage</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ItinClassIndx)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StageIdx = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#af1bc954cd72ba2c13fd0d00fd47343a9">Itineraries</a>&#91;ItinClassIndx&#93;.LastStage;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a2a932c41180f005df409d7a78ab84d45">Stages</a> + StageIdx;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return the total stage latency of the given class.  The latency is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the maximum completion time for any stage in the itinerary.  If no stages</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// exist, it defaults to one cycle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a51623c0621a7c092ac9210065f861a33"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a51623c0621a7c092ac9210065f861a33">getStageLatency</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ItinClassIndx)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the target doesn&#39;t provide itinerary information, use a simple</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non-zero default value for all instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#affe6bc9136f849e9b46fbccf620b3409">isEmpty</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Calculate the maximum completion time for any stage.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06a2d68d32ff95cd10b4899c2823ec28e97">Latency</a> = 0, StartCycle = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage">InstrStage</a> &#42;IS = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a7327da535eb156175c5a9ec7b7fea629">beginStage</a>(ItinClassIndx),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">           &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#adb4cf1d46c5e7c0f1f877c2cd4f834a8">endStage</a>(ItinClassIndx); IS != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>; ++IS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06a2d68d32ff95cd10b4899c2823ec28e97">Latency</a> = std::max(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06a2d68d32ff95cd10b4899c2823ec28e97">Latency</a>, StartCycle + IS-&gt;getCycles());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">      StartCycle += IS-&gt;getNextCycles();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06a2d68d32ff95cd10b4899c2823ec28e97">Latency</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return the cycle for the given class and operand. Return std::nullopt if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the information is not available for the operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a0fb39c8a77b3091e6a569fe24055e06f"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a0fb39c8a77b3091e6a569fe24055e06f">getOperandCycle</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ItinClassIndx,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OperandIdx)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#affe6bc9136f849e9b46fbccf620b3409">isEmpty</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FirstIdx = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#af1bc954cd72ba2c13fd0d00fd47343a9">Itineraries</a>&#91;ItinClassIndx&#93;.FirstOperandCycle;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LastIdx = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#af1bc954cd72ba2c13fd0d00fd47343a9">Itineraries</a>&#91;ItinClassIndx&#93;.LastOperandCycle;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((FirstIdx + OperandIdx) &gt;= LastIdx)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#ae7f429bbda07a9bc2cec72092dfd1a97">OperandCycles</a>&#91;FirstIdx + OperandIdx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return true if there is a pipeline forwarding between instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// of itinerary classes DefClass and UseClasses so that value produced by an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// instruction of itinerary class DefClass, operand index DefIdx can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// bypassed when it&#39;s read by an instruction of itinerary class UseClass,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// operand index UseIdx.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a94e1f552980744a8937ef75c00232c8d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a94e1f552980744a8937ef75c00232c8d">hasPipelineForwarding</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DefClass, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DefIdx,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UseClass, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UseIdx)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FirstDefIdx = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#af1bc954cd72ba2c13fd0d00fd47343a9">Itineraries</a>&#91;DefClass&#93;.FirstOperandCycle;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LastDefIdx = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#af1bc954cd72ba2c13fd0d00fd47343a9">Itineraries</a>&#91;DefClass&#93;.LastOperandCycle;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((FirstDefIdx + DefIdx) &gt;= LastDefIdx)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#ac2d1dc9148e002610c21c5644f412eeb">Forwardings</a>&#91;FirstDefIdx + DefIdx&#93; == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FirstUseIdx = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#af1bc954cd72ba2c13fd0d00fd47343a9">Itineraries</a>&#91;UseClass&#93;.FirstOperandCycle;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LastUseIdx = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#af1bc954cd72ba2c13fd0d00fd47343a9">Itineraries</a>&#91;UseClass&#93;.LastOperandCycle;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((FirstUseIdx + UseIdx) &gt;= LastUseIdx)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#ac2d1dc9148e002610c21c5644f412eeb">Forwardings</a>&#91;FirstDefIdx + DefIdx&#93; ==</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#ac2d1dc9148e002610c21c5644f412eeb">Forwardings</a>&#91;FirstUseIdx + UseIdx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Compute and return the use operand latency of a given itinerary</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// class and operand index if the value is produced by an instruction of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// specified itinerary class and def operand index. Return std::nullopt if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the information is not available for the operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a702e147674b97e4ec87922e263e1ca73"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a702e147674b97e4ec87922e263e1ca73">getOperandLatency</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DefClass, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DefIdx,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UseClass,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UseIdx)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#affe6bc9136f849e9b46fbccf620b3409">isEmpty</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt; DefCycle = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a0fb39c8a77b3091e6a569fe24055e06f">getOperandCycle</a>(DefClass, DefIdx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt; UseCycle = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a0fb39c8a77b3091e6a569fe24055e06f">getOperandCycle</a>(UseClass, UseIdx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!DefCycle || !UseCycle)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UseCycle &gt; &#42;DefCycle + 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">    UseCycle = &#42;DefCycle - &#42;UseCycle + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UseCycle &gt; 0u &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a94e1f552980744a8937ef75c00232c8d">hasPipelineForwarding</a>(DefClass, DefIdx, UseClass, UseIdx))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: This assumes one cycle benefit for every pipeline forwarding.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">      UseCycle = &#42;UseCycle - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UseCycle;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return the number of micro-ops that the given class decodes to.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return -1 for classes that require dynamic lookup via TargetInstrInfo.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a035351039a05ded742d1958d3d63d92b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a035351039a05ded742d1958d3d63d92b">getNumMicroOps</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ItinClassIndx)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#affe6bc9136f849e9b46fbccf620b3409">isEmpty</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#af1bc954cd72ba2c13fd0d00fd47343a9">Itineraries</a>&#91;ItinClassIndx&#93;.NumMicroOps;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
